name: Vaadin.ProgressBarElement

properties.name: min
properties.description: Minimum bound of the progress bar.

properties.name: max
properties.description: Maximum bound of the progress bar.

properties.name: indeterminate
properties.description: Indeterminate state of the progress bar.

description:
`<vaadin-progress-bar>` is a Polymer 2 progress bar.

```html
<vaadin-progress-bar value="30" min="10" max="100">
</vaadin-progress-bar>
```

### Styling

The following shadow DOM parts are available for styling:

Part name | Description 
----------------|----------------
`bar` | Progress-bar's background 
`value` | Progress-bar's foreground 

The following custom properties are available:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|-------------
`--vaadin-progress-value` | current progress value (between 0 and 1) | 0

The following state attributes are available for styling:

Attribute       | Description | Part name
----------------|-------------|------------
`indeterminate` | Set to an indeterminate progress bar | :host
